source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_00<tab>Notched Bone and Dedean seem to be on the brink of starvation.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_00<tab>イディルシャイアのノッチド・ボーンは、動けなくなるほど腹が減っているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_01<tab>It seems that Notched Bone and Dedean have not eaten in quite some time and they are understandably very hungry. What is less understandable is their refusal to eat the food they have been provisioned with by the goblins. They are under the impression that it is poisoned and are completely unreceptive to suggestions to the contrary. Notched Bone asks you to slay a crawler and harvest its flesh such that he and Dedean may eat. Raw crawler flesh is inedible, but it should be fine if cooked thoroughly. Notched Bone asks that after harvesting the crawler meat, you roast it at the goblin bonfire in the Answering Quarter. Feed these stubborn two now, and deal with their prejudices later.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_01<tab>ノッチド・ボーンはどんなに腹が減っても、ゴブリン族にもらった食べ物には手を付けたくないようだ。冒険者は<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>を入手し、それを焼くよう頼まれた。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン学士街にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_02<tab>You slay a crawler and gather a good, large slice of its flesh. Even someone on the brink of starvation would not eat this meat raw. Roast the slice of crawler flesh at the bonfire in the Answering Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>を入手した。シャーレアン学士街の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C5801 /var>」で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>」を焼こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_03<tab>You find the bonfire Notched Bone described and slowly roast the crawler flesh, thoroughly cooking it all the way through. Deliver the roasted crawler flesh to Notched Bone and Dedean back at Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>を焼いた。イディルシャイアの「ノッチド・ボーン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_04<tab>You deliver the crawler meat to Notched Bone and Dedean. Now that they have something to sate their empty stomachs, they hand you the jerked water buffalo meat that the goblins supplied them with. They ask you to return it to the goblin who gave it to them─the coalshifter goblin near the bonfire over which you cooked the crawler flesh.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>をノッチド・ボーンに渡したところ、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>をゴブリン族に返すよう頼まれた。シャーレアン学士街の「焚き火番のゴブリン族」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_05<tab>You return the jerked water buffalo to the coalshifter goblin, explaining that the two refugees have secured an alternate source of sustenance in the crawlers that roam the hinterlands. Upon hearing this, the goblin becomes very concerned. No matter how it is prepared, crawler flesh is inedible and can cause severe stomach pains in goblins. He doubts that Lalafell or Roegadyn will fare any better from eating it. He provides you with some gobbietea, which should help to alleviate any stomach problems the two refugees might suffer, and requests that you return to the two and check on their well-being.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_05<tab>焚き火番のゴブリン族に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>のことを話した。焚き火番のゴブリン族は、人が<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>を食べると腹を壊すかもしれないと心配し、薬茶をくれた。ノッチド・ボーンたちの様子を確認するため、イディルシャイアの「ノッチド・ボーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_06<tab>It seems that the coalshifter goblin's concerns were well founded. You find Notched Bone and Dedean racked with terrible stomach pains. Administer the gobbietea. It should ameliorate the symptoms they are suffering.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_06<tab>ノッチド・ボーンとデデアンは、腹を壊していた。イディルシャイアの「ノッチド・ボーン」と「デデアン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7001 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_07<tab>The gobbietea starts to take effect immediately. Though they are still in pain, Notched Bone's and Dedean's conditions seem to be improving rapidly. Speak with Notched Bone and explain that the medicine that cured him was provided by the same goblin that gave him the jerked water buffalo meat that he refused to eat.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_07<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7001 /var>をふたりに飲ませた。イディルシャイアの「ノッチド・ボーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_08<tab>Notched Bone is shocked to learn that the medicine came from a goblin. He is still somewhat skeptical about the goblins' motivations, explaining that in all their time as refugees, he and Dedean have only ever experienced kindness as part of a plan to cheat them. It was just such a ploy that led them to be tricked into debt in Ul'dah, forcing them to leave the nation and find a new home.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_08<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7001 /var>が効いて、ノッチド・ボーンたちの腹痛は和らいだようだ。しかし、ノッチド・ボーンのゴブリン族への不信が和らぐことはなかった……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_09<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_00<tab>Obtain crawler flesh from a crawler.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_00<tab>シャーレアン学士街の<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_01<tab>Roast the crawler flesh on the bonfire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C5801 /var>で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>を焼く

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the roasted crawler flesh to Notched Bone.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_02<tab>イディルシャイアのノッチド・ボーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_03<tab>Return the jerked water buffalo to the goblin coalshifter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_03<tab>シャーレアン学士街の焚き火番のゴブリン族に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Notched Bone.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_04<tab>イディルシャイアのノッチド・ボーンと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_05<tab>Cure Notched Bone with the gobbietea.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_05<tab>ノッチド・ボーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7001 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_06<tab>Cure Dedean with the gobbietea.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_06<tab>デデアンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7001 /var>を使う

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_07<tab>ノッチド・ボーンと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_000<tab>I just can't work out how we're gonna cure these people of this horrible goblin brainwashin'. But I'm so hungry I can barely think! Maybe if I had a good meal, I'd be able to work it out...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_000<tab>チッ、ゴブリン族の洗脳を解く鍵が、見つからねえとはな。
それにしても、腹が空きすぎて倒れそうだぜ。
……ここについてから、ろくに飯をくってねぇ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_001<tab>I'm starving too! Do you think we should eat that jerked water buffalo we got from the goblin at the bonfire?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_001<tab>兄貴、僕のお腹もきゅうきゅういってるっす……。
焚き火の番をしてるゴブリン族から貰った、
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>を食べてみないっすか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_002<tab>Don't be a fool, Dedean! Food from a goblin? It might be poisoned!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_002<tab>……馬鹿野郎！
ゴブリン族にもらった肉が食えるか！
干し肉には、毒が入ってるに決まってるぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_003<tab>Don't look so skeptical. Why would the goblins go givin' refugees like us perfectly good meat? Hm? Now, those crawlers outside─they have a fair bit of flesh on 'em. Could you kill one and bring us a nice good slice of its meat? I think we're both too weak from hunger to do it ourselves...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_003<tab>しかたねえ、アンタよお、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」の肉を、取ってきてくれねえか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_004<tab>I doubt it's edible raw. There's a bonfire in the Answering Quarter. If you roasted the meat there, I figure it'd come out pretty good. Please hurry. I'm so hungry I can barely move.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_004<tab>生では食えねえが、
「学士街」の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C5801 /var>」で焼けば食えるはずだ。
俺たちは、空腹で動けそうにねえからな、頼んだぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_010<tab>Please, adventurer, get us a nice, big slice of meat off of one of them crawlers wrigglin' around the hinterlands.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_010<tab>しかたねえ、アンタよお、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」の肉を、取ってきてくれねえか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_011<tab>I doubt you can eat 'em raw. There's a bonfire in the Answering Quarter─roast the meat there and bring it back here. Please hurry. We're so weak from hunger, we can barely move!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_011<tab>生では食えねえが、
「学士街」の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C5801 /var>」で焼けば食えるはずだ。
俺たちは、空腹で動けそうにねえからな、頼んだぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_012<tab>I can't take it any longer. I think I'd eat just about anything. Except that horrible poisoned water buffalo meat those goblins are trying to trick us into eating!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_012<tab>もう限界、倒れそうっす……。
毒じゃなきゃなんでもいいので、お願いするっす……。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_020<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Do you want to use bonfire, uplander? Roast any tastymeats you want! Just don't let fire go out.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_020<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
あなた　焚き火で　なにか焼きたい？
火を消さないなら　問題ない　いっぱい焼いて　問題ない！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_030<tab>Oh! Adventurer! Thank the gods you're back. I thought I was about to pass out from hunger...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_030<tab>おう、アンタ！
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6D01 /var>」は、焼いてきてくれたかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_031<tab>Mmm! This ain't bad at all! Guess we don't need that jerked water buffalo after all! I'll bet it's poisoned anyway.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_031<tab>……おうおう、思ったよりも美味そうじゃねえか！
これがあれば、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>」なんていらねえぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_032<tab>Clearly you had no trouble findin' that bonfire we mentioned. Do you think you might be able to take this jerked meat back to the goblin who tends it? We sure don't want it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_032<tab>そうだ、ついでに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>」を
「焚き火番のゴブリン族」に突き返してくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_033<tab>You go tell that goblin we don't need his poisoned food. We've got this delicious roasted crawler meat! Hahaha!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_033<tab>俺たちには<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>があるから、
そんなもんいらねえって、伝えてくれや！
ガッハッハ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_043<tab>You take that jerked water buffalo back to the goblin at the bonfire. We're gonna finish off this crawler meat before it gets cold.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_043<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>」を
「焚き火番のゴブリン族」に突き返してくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_044<tab>Give that jerked water buffalo back to the goblin near the bonfire. We don't want those filthy goblins thinking we owe them anything.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_044<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>」を返すのは、敵に借りを作らないって事っす！
兄貴、カッコイイっす！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_040<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
I am just humble bonfire gobbie. Can I help you?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_040<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
わたし　しがない　焚き火番。
あなた　わたし　何か用？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_041<tab>This is jerked water buffalo I gave to refugees. They eat roast crawler flesh instead? Is that safe? Can uplanders eat that meat? It gives us gobbies horrible bellypains.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_041<tab>流民に　あげた　<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>？
代わりに　<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6E01 /var>　食べる？
……人が食べても　大丈夫？　あれは結構　お腹痛める！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_042<tab>I am very worried about the refugees' bellies. Please take this gobbietea. It is good for curing bellypains.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_042<tab>わたし　人のおなかが　とっても心配！
一応あげる　この薬茶　お腹痛いのを　治してくれる！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_052<tab>If refugees have bellypains, gobbietea should cure it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_052<tab>わたし　人のおなかが　とっても心配！
一応あげる　この薬茶　お腹痛いのを　治してくれる！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_051<tab>Ungh... My stomach... Maybe we should have just eaten that jerked water buffalo...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_051<tab>お腹、ぎゅるぎゅるっす……。
素直に……「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6F01 /var>」……食べておけば良かったっす……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_050<tab>A-Adventurer... My guts are on fire. I feel like I'm gonna die. Are those crawlers still poisonous even after you roast them right through?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_050<tab>お……おう……アンタ……。
は、腹が……ヤベエ……死ぬほど、痛え……。
やっぱり<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>は、火を通しても……む、無理……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_061<tab>What is this? Medicine? Thank you...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_061<tab>うぐぐ……や、薬茶……だって……？
ありがてえ……いただくぜ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_084<tab>Ungh... I've gotta make it through this. I have to protect Dedean... But I think that tea is workin'. The pain is a little better now.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_084<tab>くう……痛みに……負けるか……。
俺は……デデアンと……ふたりで生きていくんだ……。
……むう……薬茶のおかげか……痛みが……和らいで……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_071<tab>Ungh... I can see my dead grandma. She's calling me─asking me to go with her... I should take that medicine.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_071<tab>あぐぐ……死んだ婆ちゃんが……呼んでるっす……。
だ、ダメっす……薬茶……飲むっす……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_083<tab>Sorry, Grandma. Not today. I can't leave Notched Bone behind... Th-This tea─I think it's working! My stomach feels better already!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_083<tab>うぐぐ……ごめんよう……婆ちゃん……。
兄貴を置いて……そっちにいけないっす……。
あれ……痛みが……和らいで……婆ちゃんも消えて……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_080<tab>That tea seems to be workin'. I still feel pretty awful, but it's gettin' better by the minute. Sorry for havin' caused you all this trouble, adventurer. I'm truly moved by your kindness.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_080<tab>うぐぐ……徐々にだが、痛みが和らいできたぜ……。
手間かけちまって、すまねえな、アンタ。
アンタの情けにゃ、目頭が熱くなってくらあ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_081<tab>A goblin was worried about us? He gave you that tea? I find that mighty hard to believe. There ain't a soul in the realm who gives a damn about us. Any time someone's pretended to care, it was just part of some trick. Just like that godsdamned bastard who tricked us into debt back in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_081<tab>……あの薬茶は、ゴブリン族が心配してくれた物？
まさか、嘘だろう……俺たちを心配する奴なんて、
このエオルゼアにいるもんかよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_082<tab>But you're the first person we've met who actually seems to care... Look, them goblins gave us much more food than just that jerked water buffalo. Please, take some of this for your troubles. I still ain't convinced it's not poisoned, though.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_082<tab>いままで、俺たちに優しくする奴は、皆、裏があった。
俺たちをはめた、あの悪徳金貸しだってそうだった。
だから、奴らだって……裏があるにちげえねえ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_060<tab>deleted
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_060<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
